QueryDefinition.Query:
with a as ( SELECT DISTINCT mce.PATID, mce.YRDOB, mce.GDR_CD,
me.ELIGEFF as me_ELIGEFF, me.ELIGEND as me_ELIGEND,
mce.ELIGEFF as mce_ELIGEFF, mce.ELIGEND as mce_ELIGEND,
CASE WHEN me.eligeff < '05/01/2000' THEN '05/01/2000' ELSE me.eligeff END as p_p_startDate,
CASE WHEN mce.eligeff < '05/01/2000' THEN '05/01/2000' ELSE mce.eligeff END as o_p_startDate,
32813 as PeriodTypeConceptId, case when me.race is null or me.race = '' or lower(me.race) = 'u' then 0 when lower(me.race) = 'a' then 8515 when lower(me.race) = 'b' then 8516 when lower(me.race) = 'w' then 8527 else 0 end as RaceConceptId, case when me.ethnicity is null or me.ethnicity = '' or lower(me.ethnicity) = 'u' then 0 when lower(me.ethnicity) = 'n' then 38003564 when lower(me.ethnicity) = 'h' then 38003563 else 0 end as EthnicityConceptId, me.race AS RACE, me.ethnicity AS ETHNICITY, {location},
case when me.bus = 'MCR' then 281 when me.health_exch = '1' then 275 when me.health_exch in ('2','3') then 276 when me.bus = 'COM' then 327 else 0 end as PAYER_CONCEPT_ID, CONCAT(me.bus, me.health_exch) as PAYER_SOURCE_VALUE, CONCAT(me.product, me.cdhp) as PLAN_SOURCE_VALUE, CONCAT(me.aso, me.group_nbr) as SPONSOR_SOURCE_VALUE, me.family_id as FAMILY_SOURCE_VALUE FROM {sc}.MEMBER_CONTINUOUS_ENROLLMENT mce JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND mce.PATID = ch.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN {sc}.MEMBER_ENROLLMENT me ON mce.PATID = me.PATID ), a2 as ( SELECT DISTINCT mce.PATID, mce.YRDOB, CASE WHEN mce.eligeff < '05/01/2000' THEN '05/01/2000' ELSE mce.eligeff END as startDate, me.family_id as FAMILY_SOURCE_VALUE FROM {sc}.MEMBER_CONTINUOUS_ENROLLMENT mce LEFT JOIN {sc}.MEMBER_ENROLLMENT me ON mce.PATID = me.PATID )
select a.*, m2.patid as baby_person_id, case when DATE_PART('year', m2.startDate) = m2.yrdob then min(m2.startDate) else min(CAST((CAST(m2.yrdob AS VARCHAR) || '-' || DATE_PART('MONTH', m2.startDate) || '-01') AS DATE)) end as baby_dob from a left join a2 m2 on a.patid != m2.patid and a.gdr_cd = 'F' and a.FAMILY_SOURCE_VALUE is not null and a.FAMILY_SOURCE_VALUE = m2.FAMILY_SOURCE_VALUE and m2.yrdob - DATE_PART('YEAR', m2.startDate) = 0 group by a.patid, a.yrdob, a.gdr_cd, a.me_ELIGEFF, a.me_ELIGEND, a.mce_ELIGEFF, a.mce_ELIGEND, a.p_p_startDate, a.o_p_startDate, a.periodtypeconceptid, a.raceconceptid, a.ethnicityconceptid, a.race, a.ethnicity, a.location, a.PAYER_CONCEPT_ID, a.PAYER_SOURCE_VALUE, a.PLAN_SOURCE_VALUE, a.SPONSOR_SOURCE_VALUE, a.FAMILY_SOURCE_VALUE, baby_person_id, m2.yrdob, m2.startDate order by a.PATID
